lead_paragraph: HUPERT--Mark, 89, of New York City, passed peacefully on March 23, 2016 surrounded by family. Loving husband of Dr. Cesia Hupert and father to Matthew (Meghan) and Danny (Maria). Adoring grandfather of Maya and Miles. Beloved brother-in-law, uncle and great-uncle of a large and loving clan. Mark was born in Lodz, Poland and was a survivor of six years in the concentration camps. After his liberation, Mark studied at the University of Munich to become an engineer. He and his family immigrated to the United States in 1959. Mark, a lover of all things chocolate, was an avid Yankees fan and the patriarch to us all. Memorial services will be held at the Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 West 76 Street, New York, NY on Monday, March 28, 2016 at Noon. Donations in his memory can be made to Doctors Without Borders. 1/3
